Caption: The audience arises and the academic procession enters the Open Air Theatre
Description: Mr. M. C. Chagla said that he was highly impressed by the institute and its professors. Mr. C. V. Sethunathan, seen at extreme left, succeeded Mr. R. Natarajan as the Registrar of IIT Madras. Mrs. Shanti Sengupto, wife of Prof. B. Sengupto is also seen (behind Dr. A. L. Mudaliar). Sethunathan took over as Registrar 3 days after this convocation.
